description: This tool provides guidance for creating a new recovery partition on a Windows system. It includes instructions to manually resize your existing partition to accommodate the installation of the Windows Recovery Environment (WinRE) update. Users can follow the detailed steps outlined in the associated KB article to ensure proper partition management. This process helps in maintaining the integrity of the recovery options available for troubleshooting and repairing Windows issues. The detailed description for this Tool is provided in the Fix description.
